name: iccpartel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), c2, co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wf(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wf(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ciccp, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), co(cfv(c2, nat0), cicc, cfv(c2, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ciccp, c1)))

comment: If there is a partition, then all intermediate points and bounds are contained in a closed interval of extended reals. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jul-2020.)
